# %% [markdown]
# Tail Call Optimization (TCO)

# %%--- [javascript]
# properties:
#   run_on_load: true
# ---%%
var reverseString = (str, reversed = '') => {
    if (str === '') {
        return reversed;
    } else {
        return reverseString(str.substring(1), reversed + str[0]);
    }
};

console.log(reverseString('hello'));
